name: MyTube
description:
If possible, please play the Windows version for best performance.

A game made for the Ludum Dare Game Jam #46. The theme was "Keep it alive" and the game was made over the course of 72 hours for the jam category.

Choose your character and choose your MyTube channel to start your MyTube career. Feed your video ideas with fun, memes, ads and clickbaits to reach more viewers, subscribers and money.

But watch out for other channels who want to steal your viewers, the nasty copy right claims who try to shutdown your videos and the demonetizer who cuts off your money stream.

Can you reach the ultimate goal of 100 million subscribers?

Important Message

This game supports gamepads.

Please rate us on  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/mytube.

How to Play
  • Use the arrow keys, WASD or your gamepad to control your character.
  • Collect pickups to feed your video ideas.
  • Protect your videos against enemies.
  • Reach 100 million subscriber.
Team

Sebastian Uitz (https://firetotemgames.com/)

  • Programming

Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/)
